name: Fire'n Dawn
description:
Little information about the game:

Fire'n Dawn is a RPG based game. Player tries to beat the enemies and collect the shields to reach the treasure room. Player must find the shields to give them to Gatekeeper. Map contains shields on different places. Also creatures drops shields when they dies. Player must find 7 pieces of shield to complete the map. Map has 6 creature to beat and several shields to find. Even if player defeats all enemies he/she needs find one more shield in map -which are hidden in map-.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

F - Igniting Touch: Strike an enemy with this melee ability to burn them and cause them to explode

E - Soul of Flame: Heal yourself with the power of fire

Note: Each skill needs small amount of mana to use.
